attributes.action: get rid of sexism within anne summers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why are men not allowed to go to anne summers parties when they sell mens items in the catalog. is this a disregard for mens human rights and sexism in the highest regard, if it is a woman only issue i wish that all mens  paraphenalia be deleted from there catalog

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
